Vue calendrier avec phases, prédictions et événements

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"startDate","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Date de début (YYYY-MM-DD)","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"months","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Nombre de mois (défaut: 3)","schema":{"type":"number"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Calendrier généré avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"calendar":{"description":"Jours du calendrier","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","description":"Date du jour","example":"2024-01-15"},"phase":{"type":"string","description":"Phase du cycle ce jour","enum":["MENSTRUAL","FOLLICULAR","OVULATION","LUTEAL"],"example":"MENSTRUAL"},"cycleDay":{"type":"number","description":"Jour du cycle (1-40)","example":1},"dayType":{"type":"string","description":"Type de jour","example":"period_start","enum":["period_start","period_day","ovulation","fertile","normal","predicted_period","predicted_ovulation"]},"events":{"description":"Événements/symptômes ce jour","example":["crampes","flux_fort"],"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"isPredicted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Jour prédit ou confirmé","example":false}},"required":["date","dayType","isPredicted"],"title":"CalendarDayDto"}},"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de début du calendrier","example":"2024-01-01"},"endDate":{"type":"string","description":"Date de fin du calendrier","example":"2024-03-31"},"monthsCount":{"type":"number","description":"Nombre de mois affichés","example":3},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message informatif","example":"Calendrier du cycle pour 3 mois avec prédictions"}},"required":["calendar","startDate","endDate","monthsCount","message"],"title":"CycleCalendarResponseDto"}}}}}}
 id="cycle-controller-get-cycle-calendar-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
